children.value: 多标签页切换多标签栏

{ () => { let id = 4; const [tablist, settablist] = React.useState([ { name: '标签1', value: '1', }, { name: '标签2', value: '2', }, { name: '标签3', value: '3', } ]) return (
{ tablist.map((item, index) => { return ( {item.name} ) }) }
) } }
设置addable属性实现标签的动态添加

{ () => { const [tabindex, settabindex] = React.useState(4); const [tablist, settablist] = React.useState([ { name: '标签1', value: '1', }, { name: '标签2', value: '2', }, { name: '标签3', value: '3', } ]) function tabAdd() { let _list = tablist.slice(); _list.push({ value: `${tabindex}`, name: `标签${tabindex}` }) let index = tabindex + 1; settabindex(index); settablist(_list); } return (
{ tablist.map((item, index) => { return ( {item.name} ) }) }
) } }
设置closable属性实现标签的动态添加

{ () => { const [tabindex, settabindex] = React.useState(4); const [tablist, settablist] = React.useState([ { name: '标签1', value: '1', }, { name: '标签2', value: '2', }, { name: '标签3', value: '3', } ]) function tabAdd() { let _list = tablist.slice(); _list.push({ value: `${tabindex}`, name: `标签${tabindex}` }) let index = tabindex + 1; settabindex(index); settablist(_list); } return (
{ tablist.map((item, index) => { return ( {item.name} ) }) }
) } }
